about.title: About me
about.p1: From the first line of code, I was fascinated by the power to build logical structures and create interactive experiences. My passion lies in solving puzzles and bringing creative ideas to life. This drives my constant desire to learn, and I am excited to start the backend course immediately following my frontend bootcamp to become a full-stack developer.
about.info1: Based in Olpe, I am perfectly set up for remote work and open to various working models to contribute my skills to exciting projects.
about.info2: I am deeply enthusiastic about diving into new technologies. My journey through the Developer Akademie has solidified my belief in lifelong learning, and I am always eager to embrace the next challenge and expand my tech stack.
about.info3: I approach challenges with a structured and analytical mindset. For me, every problem is an opportunity to find the most efficient and elegant solution, combining creative thinking with persistent, methodical work to achieve clean and effective results.

skills.title: My skills
skills.p1: I have experience in implementing projects with various front-end technologies and agile methodologies.
skills.p3: I am enthusiastic about learning new technologies and frameworks to stay on the cutting edge.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.intro: Here is a selection of my projects. Feel free to check them out and test the applications.
portfolio.join_description: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
portfolio.pokedex_description: Based on the PokéAPI a simple library that provides and catalogues pokemon information.
portfolio.el_pollo_loco_description: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.

general.title: 2. General Information
general.content: The protection of your personal data is of particular concern to me. I process your data exclusively on the basis of the statutory provisions (GDPR, TKG 2003). In this privacy policy, I inform you about the most important aspects of data processing within the scope of my website.

contactForm.title: 3. Contact Form
contactForm.content1: If you contact me via the form on the website, the data you provide (name, email address, message content) will be transmitted to and processed by the service provider Formspree to handle your request. I do not store this data myself beyond the processing by Formspree.
contactForm.content2: This data processing is based on your consent (Art. 6 (1) (a) GDPR). You can revoke this consent at any time by sending an informal email to the address mentioned above. The legality of the data processing operations carried out until the revocation remains unaffected. For more information on how Formspree handles user data, please see Formspree's privacy policy.

rights.title: 4. Your Rights
rights.content: You have the fundamental rights to access, rectification, erasure, restriction of processing, data portability, and object. If you believe that the processing of your data violates data protection law or your data protection claims have otherwise been violated, you can contact me at any time.
